mapper.select: /* eventDAO.eventList */ select a.event_no , a.hakwon_no , a.event_title , a.reg_user_no , date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y년%m월%d일 %H:%i') as reg_date , date_format(a.udp_date, '%Y년%m월%d일 %H:%i') as udp_date , date_format(a.begin_date, '%Y년%m월%d일') as begin_date , date_format(a.begin_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as new_date , date_format(a.end_date, '%Y년%m월%d일') as end_date , case when now() between a.begin_date and a.end_date then 'Y' else 'N' end as ing_yn , (select count(1) from tb_content_read where content_type = '003' and content_parent_no = a.event_no and user_no = #{user_no}) as read_status from tb_event a , tb_user_info b where a.hakwon_no = #{hakwon_no} and a.reg_user_no = b.user_no and a.event_status = '001' order by a.event_no desc limit #{start_no}, #{page_scale}
/* eventDAO.eventListTotCount */ select count(1) from tb_event a where a.hakwon_no = #{hakwon_no} and a.event_status = '001'

/* eventDAO.eventDetail */ select a.event_no , a.hakwon_no , a.event_title , a.event_content , a.reg_user_no , b.user_name as reg_user_name , date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y년%m월%d일 %H:%i') as reg_date , date_format(a.udp_date, '%Y년%m월%d일 %H:%i') as udp_date , date_format(a.begin_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as begin_date , date_format(a.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as end_date , a.recommend_yn , a.add_info_title from tb_event a , tb_user_info b where a.event_no = #{event_no} and a.reg_user_no = b.user_no and a.event_status = '001'

/* eventDAO.eventMemberList */ select a.user_no , b.user_type , c.user_id , c.user_name , case when c.user_gender = 'M' then '남' else '여' end as user_gender_name , c.tel1_no , get_file_path(c.photo_file_no) as photo_file_path , get_code_name('001', b.user_type) as user_type_name , calc_age(c.user_birthday) as user_age from tb_event_user a , tb_user b , tb_user_info c where a.event_no = #{event_no} and a.user_no = b.user_no and a.user_no = c.user_no order by a.reg_date asc
mapper.delete: /* eventDAO.eventCompletelyRemove */ delete from tb_event where event_no = #{event_no}
mapper.select: select count(1) from tb_event_user where event_no = #{event_no}
